traits.name: Compression
traits.description: The octopus can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Ink Cloud
reactions.trigger: A creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the octopus while underwater.
reactions.response: The octopus releases ink that fills a 5-foot Cube centered on itself, and the octopus moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.
